about_the_game:
Gameplay:

Insanias is a first-person interactive exploration and psychological horror simulator. While trying to maintain your sanity, you must explore a completely unknown environment in search of clues that explain what has happened.

There are several events that can be randomly triggered, making each player's experience unique.

Storyline:

The story will have to be discovered as you advance in the game, however, the end of it will depend on the actions taken by the player himself during the tour... Will you be able to make it?

About me:

Hello, my name is Federico and I am the developer of the game Insanias. I want to thank each one of you for giving it a chance and for taking the time to play this game, it's my first experience and for me it's a very important project. Each of your opinions about it are very important to me. This will allow me to consider the mistakes and become a better developer. For this reason, I would like to ask you to leave your comments, even if they are small, I really want to know your opinion.
Thank you very much!

There are several events that can be randomly triggered, making each player's experience unique.

Hello, my name is Federico and I am the developer of the game Insanias. I want to thank each one of you for giving it a chance and for taking the time to play this game, it's my first experience and for me it's a very important project. name: Insanias

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Full controller support
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Full controller support

short_description: Insanias is a psychological horror game where you will have to explore what happened to find a hidden truth. To do this, you will have to be able to control your sanity to avoid falling into the madness that lurks in every corner. Are you ready to face your fears and discover the truth?
